verses.text: \w When|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w made|strong="H1961"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w change|strong="H7725"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* Zion's fate, \w we|strong="H7725"\w* \w were|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* men \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w a|strong="H1961"\w* \w dream|strong="H2492"\w*.

\w Then|strong="H0227"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w mouths|strong="H6310"\w* \w were|strong="H0428"\w* \w full|strong="H4390"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* laughing, \w and|strong="H3068"\w* \w our|strong="H3068"\w* \w tongues|strong="H3956"\w* \w gave|strong="H0559"\w* \w a|strong="H3068"\w* glad \w cry|strong="H7440"\w*; \w they|strong="H3068"\w* \w said|strong="H0559"\w* \w among|strong="H5973"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w nations|strong="H1471"\w*, \w The|strong="H0559"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w great|strong="H1431"\w* \w things|strong="H0428"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w them|strong="H6213"\w*.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w has|strong="H3068"\w* \w done|strong="H6213"\w* \w great|strong="H1431"\w* \w things|strong="H1431"\w* \w for|strong="H3068"\w* \w us|strong="H6213"\w*; \w because|strong="H5973"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* which \w we|strong="H6213"\w* \w are|strong="H3068"\w* \w glad|strong="H8056"\w*.

Let \w our|strong="H3068"\w* fate \w be|strong="H3068"\w* changed, \w O|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*, \w like|strong="H7725"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w streams|strong="H0650"\w* \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w South|strong="H5045"\w*.

Those who put \w in|strong="H1832"\w* \w seed|strong="H2232"\w* with weeping will get \w in|strong="H1832"\w* \w the|strong="H2232"\w* grain with cries \w of|strong="H7440"\w* \w joy|strong="H7440"\w*.

Though \w a|strong="H5375"\w* man may \w go|strong="H1980"\w* \w out|strong="H1980"\w* \w weeping|strong="H1058"\w*, \w taking|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* vessel \w of|strong="H2233"\w* \w seed|strong="H2233"\w* \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w him|strong="H0935"\w*; \w he|strong="H1980"\w* \w will|strong="H2233"\w* \w come|strong="H0935"\w* again \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w joy|strong="H7440"\w*, \w with|strong="H1980"\w* \w the|strong="H0935"\w* corded stems \w of|strong="H2233"\w* \w grain|strong="H2233"\w* \w in|strong="H1980"\w* \w his|strong="H5375"\w* arms.
